verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> led <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%>, he was <S%G5305>afterward<s%> an <S%G3983>hungred<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> , Man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G2198><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3880>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>setteth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125%G3754>written<s%>, He shall <S%G1781>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G142>up<s%>, lest at any <S%G3379>time<s%> thou <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> , Thou shalt <S%G1598><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> tempt <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G3825>Again<s%>, the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3880>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1166>sheweth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou wilt fall <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Get thee hence <S%G5217><s%> , Satan <S%G4567><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> , Thou shalt worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G846><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> shalt thou serve <S%G3000><s%> .

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>leaveth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.
¶ <S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was cast into <S%G3860>prison<s%>, he <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is upon the sea <S%G3864>coast<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G2194>Zabulon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3508>Nephthalim<s%>:
<S%G2443>That<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zabulon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Nephthalim<s%>, by the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>;

The <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> to them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> is sprung <S%G393%G846>up<s%>.

¶ <S%G575>From<s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%>, Repent <S%G3340><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%> .

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Follow <S%G1205%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G1350>nets<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> going <S%G4260>on<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2385>James<s%> the son <S%G3588>of<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>, <S%G2675>mending<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>fame<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2560>sick<s%> <S%G2192>people<s%> that were taken <S%G4912>with<s%> <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G931>torments<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> those which were possessed with <S%G1139>devils<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> those which were <S%G4583>lunatick<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> those that had the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> multitudes of <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>.
